subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles, the defending Stanley Cup champion, defeated San Jose in Game 7 to advance to the Western Conference finals. Last year, the Kings did not reach a Game 7 in any series.
snippet: Los Angeles, the defending Stanley Cup champion, defeated San Jose in Game 7 to advance to the Western Conference finals. Last year, the Kings did not reach a Game 7 in any series.
